query:
INSERT INTO iot_devices (device_id, name, type, protocol, status, location, last_seen, is_active) 
VALUES 
('TEMP-001', 'Temperature Sensor A1', 'sensor', 'mqtt', 'online', 'Production Line 1', NOW(), 1),
('PRESS-002', 'Pressure Sensor B2', 'sensor', 'http', 'online', 'Production Line 1', NOW(), 1),
('VIB-003', 'Vibration Monitor C3', 'sensor', 'mqtt', 'warning', 'Production Line 2', DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE), 1),
('PWR-004', 'Power Meter D4', 'meter', 'coap', 'offline', 'Main Panel', DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 HOUR), 1)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_seen = NOW();
